fieldUpdates.name: Case Approved at Level 1 for Payments
Case Status update to L2 Escalated

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Order Schedule') , NOW()+ ((24* 60) + 0)/1440, IF(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Order Cancellation'), NOW()+ ((12* 60) + 0)/1440, IF( ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Delivery Forecast'),NOW()+ ((1* 60) + 0)/1440,now())))
fieldUpdates.name: Set Open Escalation Date time
Submitted For US Approval as False
Submitted For US Approval as TRUE

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(Dynamic_SLA__c == 0.00, 'None', IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Dynamic_SLA__c), "."), LEFT(TEXT(Dynamic_SLA__c), FIND(".", TEXT(Dynamic_SLA__c)) -1) & "," & RPAD(MID(TEXT(ROUND(Dynamic_SLA__c, 2)), FIND(".", TEXT(Dynamic_SLA__c))+1, 2), 2, "0"), TEXT(Dynamic_SLA__c) & ",00" ))
fieldUpdates.name: Update SLA Field

rules.fullName: Approve Case for some case type

criteriaItems.value: Invoice,Payments,Shipping Address,Other account related data,Batch error,Product Complaints By FaSM & RSMers without Return,Credit Limit - Modification

For New Client when case is closed! To Kevin and Eugenia
This workflow is used for Case Escalation (Argentina)

rules.formula: OR( AND( OR( TEXT(Type) = 'Rainfall', TEXT(Type) = 'Mandi price' ), OR( TEXT(Call_Stage_at_which_the_call_closed__c) = 'Product recommendation given', TEXT(Call_Stage_at_which_the_call_closed__c) = 'Product re- recommend', TEXT(Call_Stage_at_which_the_call_closed__c) = 'Next Crop Recommendation' ), TEXT(Cross_selling_Opportunity__c) = 'Opportunity Available', NOT(ISBLANK( TEXT(Product_Recommended_1_gc__c))) ), AND( OR( TEXT(Type) = 'Insect', TEXT(Type) = 'Disease', TEXT(Type) = 'Product', TEXT(Type) = 'Weed', TEXT(Type) = 'Fertilizer', TEXT(Type) = 'Seed selection', TEXT(Type) = 'General crop info', TEXT(Type) = 'PGR', TEXT(Type) = 'Flowering and Fruiting related', TEXT(Type) = 'Sowing/Nursery', TEXT(Type) = 'Seed Treatment', TEXT(Type) = 'Irrigation', TEXT(Type) = 'Nutrient deficiency', TEXT(Type) = 'Inter cultivation', TEXT(Type) = 'Land preparation' ), NOT(ISBLANK( TEXT(Product_Recommended_1_gc__c ))) ), OR( TEXT(Type) = 'Product Recommendation', NOT(ISBLANK( TEXT(Product_Recommended_1_gc__c))) ), OR( NOT(ISBLANK( TEXT(Product_1__c))) ) )

OR( AND( OR( TEXT(Type) = 'Rainfall', TEXT(Type) = 'Mandi price' ), OR( TEXT(Call_Stage_at_which_the_call_closed__c) = 'Product recommendation given', TEXT(Call_Stage_at_which_the_call_closed__c) = 'Product re- recommend', TEXT(Call_Stage_at_which_the_call_closed__c) = 'Next Crop Recommendation' ), TEXT(Cross_selling_Opportunity__c) = 'Opportunity Available', NOT(ISBLANK( TEXT(Product_Recommended_2_gc__c ))) ), AND( OR( TEXT(Type) = 'Insect', TEXT(Type) = 'Disease', TEXT(Type) = 'Product', TEXT(Type) = 'Weed', TEXT(Type) = 'Fertilizer', TEXT(Type) = 'Seed selection', TEXT(Type) = 'General crop info', TEXT(Type) = 'PGR', TEXT(Type) = 'Flowering and Fruiting related', TEXT(Type) = 'Sowing/Nursery', TEXT(Type) = 'Seed Treatment', TEXT(Type) = 'Irrigation', TEXT(Type) = 'Nutrient deficiency', TEXT(Type) = 'Inter cultivation', TEXT(Type) = 'Land preparation' ), NOT(ISBLANK( TEXT( Product_Recommended_2_gc__c ))) ) , OR( TEXT(Type) = 'Product Recommendation', NOT(ISBLANK( TEXT(Product_Recommended_2_gc__c ))) ), OR( NOT(ISBLANK( TEXT(Product_2__c))) ) )

OR( AND( OR( TEXT(Type) = 'Rainfall', TEXT(Type) = 'Mandi price' ), OR( TEXT(Call_Stage_at_which_the_call_closed__c) = 'Product recommendation given', TEXT(Call_Stage_at_which_the_call_closed__c) = 'Product re- recommend', TEXT(Call_Stage_at_which_the_call_closed__c) = 'Next Crop Recommendation' ), TEXT(Cross_selling_Opportunity__c) = 'Opportunity Available', NOT(ISBLANK( TEXT(Product_Recommended_3_gc__c ))) ), AND( OR( TEXT(Type) = 'Insect', TEXT(Type) = 'Disease', TEXT(Type) = 'Product', TEXT(Type) = 'Weed', TEXT(Type) = 'Fertilizer', TEXT(Type) = 'Seed selection', TEXT(Type) = 'General crop info', TEXT(Type) = 'PGR', TEXT(Type) = 'Flowering and Fruiting related', TEXT(Type) = 'Sowing/Nursery', TEXT(Type) = 'Seed Treatment', TEXT(Type) = 'Irrigation', TEXT(Type) = 'Nutrient deficiency', TEXT(Type) = 'Inter cultivation', TEXT(Type) = 'Land preparation' ), NOT(ISBLANK( TEXT(Product_Recommended_3_gc__c ))) ), OR( TEXT(Type) = 'Product Recommendation', NOT(ISBLANK( TEXT(Product_Recommended_3_gc__c ))) ) )

OR( AND( OR( TEXT(Type) = 'Rainfall', TEXT(Type) = 'Mandi price' ), OR( TEXT(Call_Stage_at_which_the_call_closed__c) = 'Product recommendation given', TEXT(Call_Stage_at_which_the_call_closed__c) = 'Product re- recommend', TEXT(Call_Stage_at_which_the_call_closed__c) = 'Next Crop Recommendation' ), TEXT(Cross_selling_Opportunity__c) = 'Opportunity Available', NOT(ISBLANK( TEXT( Product_Recommended_4__c ))) ), AND( OR( TEXT(Type) = 'Insect', TEXT(Type) = 'Disease', TEXT(Type) = 'Product', TEXT(Type) = 'Weed', TEXT(Type) = 'Fertilizer', TEXT(Type) = 'Seed selection', TEXT(Type) = 'General crop info', TEXT(Type) = 'PGR', TEXT(Type) = 'Flowering and Fruiting related', TEXT(Type) = 'Sowing/Nursery', TEXT(Type) = 'Seed Treatment', TEXT(Type) = 'Irrigation', TEXT(Type) = 'Nutrient deficiency', TEXT(Type) = 'Inter cultivation', TEXT(Type) = 'Land preparation' ), NOT(ISBLANK( TEXT(Product_Recommended_4__c))) ) , OR( TEXT(Type) = 'Product Recommendation', NOT(ISBLANK( TEXT(Product_Recommended_4__c))) ) )

rules.description: Used for Brazil: when Case is Close
Used for Brazil: when Case is Close
Used for Brazil: when Case is Created
Used for Brazil: When Case is Reopen
rules.formula: AND(RecordType.Name='Brazil Case Process',ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Status ),"Brazil Case Closed"),ISPICKVAL(Status,"Open"))

rules.description: Used to set Escalation Date Time
Used for Brazil: used when Brazil case Status is 'Pending'
used for Brazil: update SLA field used in Email Notifications

rules.fullName: Brazil%3A Increment Case Escalation when Close
rules.description: Used for Brazil: Increment Case Escalation when case status changes from Close to Open
rules.formula: IF( AND(RecordType.Name='Brazil Case Process', TEXT(PRIORVALUE( Status)) = 'Brazil Case Closed' && ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Open') ),true , false)

rules.fullName: Brazil%3A Increment Case Escalation when Pending
rules.description: Used for Brazil: Increment Case Escalation when case status changes from Pending to Open
rules.formula: IF( AND(RecordType.Name='Brazil Case Process', TEXT(PRIORVALUE( Status)) = 'Pending' && ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Open') ) ,true , false)

rules.fullName: Case Assignment Argentina New Client Type
rules.description: For Case type : New Client

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10)
rules.description: Send email alert to case owner every time case is created

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10)
rules.description: This alert is for case closure.

rules.booleanFilter: (1 AND 2 AND(3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8))

For Sending Email to Case Owner Added By Bhavik

rules.fullName: Change NAM Case Status To Closed
rules.description: When status is approved and fields is updated.
rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL( Status ,"Approved") , OR(ISCHANGED( Has_case_been_resolved_in_SAP__c ),ISCHANGED( Date_Shipped_Credited__c ),ISCHANGED( Sales_Order_Number__c ),ISCHANGED( Customer_Comments__c )))

rules.fullName: Change Status to New on case edit
rules.description: Used for Europe
rules.formula: AND( (ISPICKVAL(Status ,'New')), OR(RecordType.DeveloperName ='Europe_Netherland_Case',RecordType.DeveloperName ='Europe_Nordic_Case',RecordType.DeveloperName ='Europe_Poland_Case',RecordType.DeveloperName ='Europe_UK_IRELAND_Case',RecordType.DeveloperName ='Europe_Belgium_Luxemburg_Case',RecordType.DeveloperName ='Europe_Switzerland_Case' ), ISCHANGED(LastModifiedDate) )

AND( ISCHANGED( Status ), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Status ),"Closed"), OR(ISPICKVAL( Status, "New"),ISPICKVAL( Status, "Open")) , IF( OR( RecordType.Name = "Distributor",RecordType.Name = "Indonesia Distributor"),true,false) )

AND(ISBLANK( Subject ),RecordType.DeveloperName!="Argentina_Distributor",RecordType.DeveloperName!="Complaint",RecordType.DeveloperName!="CSR",RecordType.DeveloperName!="FOC",RecordType.DeveloperName!="Sample",RecordType.DeveloperName!="Product_Swap")

rules.description: SMS option for pending cases to farmer. It would message product recommended along with akc toll free number.
rules.formula:
AND( RecordType.Name = 'AKC General Case', NOT(ISPICKVAL(purcahsedtherecommendedprodouct__c , 'Yes')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Rateyourexperienceonscaleof15__c,'Will be applying later')), AND( TEXT(Treatment__c) = 'Cure', Possible_date_of_application__c + 3 <= Today())
)

rules.description: SMS option for pending cases to farmer. It would message product recommended along with akc toll free number.
rules.formula:
AND( RecordType.Name = 'AKC General Case',
NOT(ISPICKVAL(purcahsedtherecommendedprodouct__c , 'Yes')) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Rateyourexperienceonscaleof15__c,'Will be applying later')), AND( TEXT(Treatment__c) = 'Preventive', DATEVALUE(CreatedDate ) + 5 <=Today()) )

rules.description: SMS option for pending cases to farmer. It would message product recommended along with akc toll free number.
SMS option for pending cases to farmer. It would message product recommended along with akc toll free number.

rules.formula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( Status ,"Closed"), ISCHANGED(Status) ,IF( Email_sent_to_Distributor__c = FALSE,true,false), IF( OR( RecordType.Name = "Distributor",RecordType.Name = "Indonesia Distributor"),true,false) ),true,false)

rules.fullName: Update Case - Neebal Integration Status - Create
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND((2 AND (3 OR 6)) OR 4) AND 5 AND 7

criteriaItems.value: Disease,Flowering and Fruiting related,Insect,Nutrient deficiency,PGR,Product,Seed Treatment,Weed

rules.fullName: Update Case - Neebal Integration Status - Update
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR (4 AND 5)) AND 6 AND 7

rules.fullName: Update Case Status as Investigation for US Cases
rules.description: This Workflow is used to update Status field for US Cases
rules.formula: AND(RecordType.DeveloperName ="US_Distributor", Performance__c = TRUE, AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Closed')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Approved at Level 1')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Approved at Level 2')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Rejected at Level 1')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Rejected at Level 2')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Approved at Level 3')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Rejected at Level 3')) ), SubmittedForUSApproval__c = FALSE)

rules.fullName: Update Case- Neebal Integration Status - Update%28Ready for Creation%29
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR (4 AND (5 OR 7))) AND 6 AND 8

criteriaItems.value: Disease,Flowering and Fruiting related,Insect,Nutrient deficiency,PGR,Product,Seed Treatment,Weed

rules.description: Updates the Neebal Integration Status on Case to Ready for Creation when it is updated and the Neebal Case Id is Blank.

rules.formula: true

rules.description: Changes done for INCTASK0171803, Farmers Age check Added! previously was : only Birthdate and Higher Qualification fields check
rules.formula: AND( OR( AND( ISBLANK( Account.PersonContact.Birthdate ), ISBLANK( Account.PersonContact.Age__c ) ), ISBLANK(TEXT(Account.PersonContact.What_is_your_highest_education_attained__c)) ), Account.PersonContact.Registration_Status__c ="Fully Registered" )
AND (PRIORVALUE( SendEmailNonsfdcuser__c ) <> true, SendEmailNonsfdcuser__c <> false)
